name: LittleMonsters
description:
Little Monsters is a turn-based strategy card game. You own a deck of monster cards, and need to save the world with limited ressources . I made it as a learning experience, so the game might not look polished, but i hope you like it anyways :)

The game is translated in english and german (screenshots show german version)

How to play:

You need only your mouse to play. You've got an energy-bar on the bottom left, and can summon your monsters to defeat the enemy monsters. Each monster has it's own unique abilities, so be careful what monsters you put into your deck ;)

Special Features: ◉ 101 Unique Monsters

◉ The Monster-Encyclopedia is fully editable. You can write your own stories about the monsters and correct my spelling/grammar mistakes :D It's auto saved.

◉ In the Options Menu, you can increase/decrease the difficulty of the AI.
